## Pre-flight Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues and this feature has not been requested yet
- [ ] I have checked the [CHANGELOG.md](../../CHANGELOG.md) to confirm this isn't already planned

## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case

Describe the problem this feature would solve or the scenario where it would be useful.

**Example:** "As a server admin, I want to [...] so that [...]"

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you'd like this feature to work. Be as specific as possible:

- What command(s) would be used?
- What would the user experience look like?
- How would it interact with existing features (zones, anonymous channels, hub, etc.)?

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered.

## Scope

Which part of the bot does this affect?

- [ ] Zone management
- [ ] Anonymous messaging
- [ ] Hub system
- [ ] Activity tracking
- [ ] Temporary groups
- [ ] Admin commands
- [ ] Database/infrastructure
- [ ] Other: ___

## Additional Context

Add any mockups, examples from other bots, or additional context here.
